content.rendered:
Directed by Rohit Shetty

Written by Vakkantham Vamsi. Yunus Sajawal. Sajid. Farhad Samji

Cast Ranveer Singh (Inspector Sangram Bhalerao a.k.a ‘Simmba’). Sara Ali Khan (Shagun Sathe). Sonu Sood (Durva Yashwant Ranade). Ashutosh Rana (Head-Constable Nityanand Mohile). Siddarth Jadhav (Sub-Inspector Santosh Tawde). Vaidehi Parshurami (Aakruti Dave). Ulka Gupta (Nandini Mohile). Suchitra Bandekar (Mrs. Mohile). Sulabha Arya (Iyer Mausi). Ashwini Kalsekar (Judge Smita Parulkar). Neha Mahajan (Kavya Singh). Nandu Madhav (Mr. Dave). Shriswara (Varsha Ranade). Sarita Joshi (Bharti Ranade (Durva’s mother)). Sneha James (Inspector Gauri Roy). Ajay Devgn (DCP Bajirao M. Singham). Karan Johar (Self in ‘Aankh Marey’ song (special appearance)). Arshad Warsi (Self in ‘Aankh Marey’ song (special appearance)). Tusshar Kapoor (Self in ‘Aankh Marey’ song (special appearance)). Shreyas Talpade (Self in ‘Aankh Marey’ song (special appearance)). Kunal Kemmu (Self in ‘Aankh Marey’ song (special appearance) (as Kunal Khemu)). Pradeep Kabra (Dagdu). Aarti Kulkarni (Good Food Lady). Arun Nalawade (Vaman Rao). Kishore Nandlaskar (Court Room Record Keeper). Nehika Singh Rajput (Good Food Lady). Anamika Shukla (Lady Cop). Prerna Trivedi (Sethani). Naushaad Abbas (Durva’s henchman). Puja Agarwal (Cameo appearance). Ronjini Chakraborty (Poornima (Shagun’s friend)). Anil Charanjeett (Purab (cameo appearance) (as Anil Mange)). Devidas Chippa (Police officer). Sunil Godse (Durva’s henchmen). Saurabh Gokhale (Gaurav Ranade a.k.a ‘Giri’). Iravati Harshe (Gayatri Devi (Simmba’s teacher)). Sahil Joshi (Aniket Mohre a.k.a ‘Chottu’). Abhishek Khandekar (IG Prakash Deshmukh). Sandhya Kute (Good Food Lady (Muslim)). Sam Nagar (Background Dancer). Vijay Patkar (Havaldar Alok Borkar). Yash Rane (Little Simmba). Besant Ravi (Sub-Inspector Gaikwad). Ashok Samarth (Advocate Rahul Joshi). Vipin Sharma (Corporator David Cameron). Amritpal Singh (Sadashiv Ranade a.k.a ‘Sada’). Uday Tikekar (Home Minister Vinayak Dutta). Ganesh Yadav (Advocate Harshit Sawalkar). Umakant Patil (Sub-Inspector Umakant Bhide) . Azzy Bagria (Anika Friend (as Bagria Azzy)). Rajesh Chitnis (Lokhende). Praveen Indu (Amit Mhatre). Abdul Muktadir Laskar ((voice)).Chandramogli Madem. Mukesh Marko (Mukesh Marko (voice)). Nileshpatelxyz (Dig nileshpatelxyz). Sharad Vittal Shetty (Police officer). Deependra Singh (Gopal). Vishalaxi Vyas (Vamanrao’s granddaughter). Ashish Warang(Cop). Akshay Kumar (Veer Suryavanshi (uncredited))

Language Hindi. Marathi. English

Producers Sadashiv Athule. George Cameron. Inderjit Chadha. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Apoorva Mehta. Rohit Shetty. Anil Thakur

Production Dharma Production. Rohit Shetty Picture
